summary: What would you do to save your child? A young teenager struggles with a debilitating mental illness as his mom risks everything to save him without losing the rest of her family.
cast: Cheryl Allison|Richard Burgi|David Schallipp|Noah Silverman|Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick|Jan Uczkowski|Julian Murdoch|Jack McCarthy|Lee Bryant|Janet Hubert|Lisa Roberts Gillan|Tony Gillan|Neal Huff|Gabriel Rush|Wyatt Ralff|Charlie Kilgore|Alysia Reiner|Kathy Najimy|Denise Ashlynd|Rebecca Baxter|Tim Bohn|Brigid Brady|Bill Buell|Julee Cerda|Jacob Clemente|Tristan Comeau|Kyle Donnery|Jim Fitzpatrick|Noah Fleiss|Jonathan Genovese|Jared Gilman|Sean Patrick Hopkins|Jack Lidji|Francesca Murdoch|Catherine Nastasi|Jake Ryan|Alex Sansalone
keywords: mental illness|based on film|family relationships|family struggles|coming of age
title: No Letting Go
